tagline: Manages HubSpot as a unified customer lifecycle system — from first touch to closed deal to renewal.
pros: Full-stack HubSpot expertise across all five Hubs
Lifecycle thinking — connects marketing, sales, and service into one system
Strong on lead scoring, attribution, and revenue-focused reporting

cons: HubSpot-centric — not a general marketing strategist
Custom development limited to Operations Hub coded actions

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
